justification: The resume shows strong leadership with roles like Founder of Al-Maqsad Foundation, managing a team of 20 and engaging with 50 donors.
Relevant experience includes sales and business development roles, though they are relatively short in duration and somewhat limited in strategic planning.
Proposal writing is noted in the resume from the Sales Management Trainee role, aligning with drafting business proposals for clients.
The candidate does not explicitly mention proficiency in CRM tools like Salesforce, indicating a gap in a key job requirement.

requirements.criteria: Strong analytical and strategic planning skills
Proficiency in CRM tools like Salesforce or HubSpot
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field

input.job_description:
**Title: Business Development Manager**  

**Company: MarketPros Enterprises**  

**Location: Remote with potential travel to client locations**  

**About Us:**  
MarketPros Enterprises is a leading global provider of innovative business solutions with the aim of maximizing brand growth. We work with diverse industries to enhance their sales infrastructure and provide unparalleled customer engagement strategies.  

**Role Overview:**  
As a Business Development Manager at MarketPros Enterprises, you will be responsible for leading strategic initiatives that drive business growth, increase market share, and strengthen client relationships. You will manage cross-functional teams to implement sales strategies, harness market insights, and drive brand expansion.  

**Key Responsibilities:**  
- Develop and implement comprehensive business strategies to enhance revenue growth.  
- Lead a team in executing marketing campaigns and optimizing sales pipelines.  
- Utilize data analytics tools to produce actionable insights improving overall performance.  
- Conduct market research to identify industry trends and new business opportunities.  
- Engage with potential clients via presentations and foster long-term relationships.  
- Manage CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot) to streamline operations and enhance productivity.  

**Preferred Skills:**  
- Proficiency in strategic planning and market analysis.  
- Strong leadership skills with proven experience in team development.  
- Advanced knowledge of CRM software and digital marketing tools.  
- Excellent communication and negotiation skills.  

Join us to push the boundaries of business innovation and help us achieve our expansion goals.
input.additional_info: MarketPros Enterprises values diversity in hiring and encourages applications from seasoned business professionals with varied backgrounds. Preferred universities include Ivy League institutions and top business schools. We offer relocation benefits for exceptional candidates and facilitate remote working arrangements. Technical and strategic competencies are assessed through a mix of psychometric evaluations and case study interviews.
minimum_requirements: Strong analytical and strategic planning skills
Proficiency in CRM tools like Salesforce or HubSpot
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field

Economics                 (Sep 2017 - May 2022) Relevant courses: Business Communication, Statistics and Data Analysis, Game Theory, Professional Communication Skills, Intro to Programming, Principles of Management, Time Series Economics, Methods and Practice of Impact Evaluation      Professional Experience  Careem (Uber Inc) Sales Coordinator:                                                                                                                                       (Nov 2022 – Dec 2022) • Oversaw the Careem for Business operations for 4 key accounts comprising 50+ users across the city. Optimized routes for ride-sharing to reduce costs and commute time. • Improved customer experience by resolving customer complaints. Liaised with the captains to address any technical issues. Monitored the progress using the Careem Solutions Portal.  Instructor Brandon | Dynatuners Sales Management Trainee:                                                                                                                     (Jan 2022 – May 2022) • Drafted business proposals for 4 prospective clients. Collaborated with the developers to provide product demos. • Shortlisted, interviewed and onboarded 15 Interns. Conducted trainings covering key concepts of B2B Sales including Buyer Personas, Customer Journey Mapping, Product-Market Fit, Competitive Analysis, Sales Flow Charts and Product Lifecycle. Created a Sales Playbook for the team.  PureLogics                                                                                                                                                    Sales Development Intern:                                                                                                                         (Sep 2021 - Oct 2021) • Generated qualified leads using LinkedIn Sales Navigator, CrunchBase and HubSpot.  Projects  Amal Academy Fellowship Program                                 (May 2021 – Jul 2021) • Completed a competitive written application and interview process to be selected from over 4500 applicants for intensive 3-month Fellowship funded by PEPSICO and Stanford University. • Invested 150 hours in order to develop business skills (e.g. Communication, Leadership, Problem Solving, Teamwork etc.) that will help me make a deeper impact on the job.  Course Project – Principles of Management              (Sep 2018 – Dec 2018) • Collaborated with a team of 5 students to conduct SWOT Analysis of the Sales Model of Nestle. Interviewed the leadership to understand the business dynamics, identify challenges and opportunities.  Extracurricular Experience  Al-Maqsad Foundation     Founder:                                                                                                                                                      (Apr 2022 – Present) • Managing a team of 20 core team members to oversee operations including fundraising through social media campaigns, case verification, field visits, updates, record keeping and monthly reports. • Partnered with 50 donors to generate regular donations to purchase monthly ration for 17 families. • Raised and disbursed PKR 20 Million for various cases related to education, healthcare, loan repayment and construction.  LUMS Religious Society     Team Member:                                                                                                                                           (Oct 2017 – May 2018) • Collaborated with a team of 15 members to conduct weekly sessions for ~300 students at an underprivileged school to deliver lectures and organize activities aiming to develop a better understanding of Islamic teachings and values.   Honors and Awards  LUMS National Outreach Program S                                                                                                     (Aug 2017)  • Got admitted to LUMS with 120% scholarship on the basis of excellent academic and extracurricular achievements.  Merit Scholarship Award – Superior Group of Colleges                                                                    (Aug 2015)  • Awarded 100% Merit Scholarship for Intermediate based on outstanding academic performance in Matriculation.  2nd Position in Inter-school Mathematics Olympiad (ISMO)                                                             (Mar 2011)  • Achieved 2nd position out of 1600 participants twice in the PakTurk ISMO competition in Peshawar.                                                                                                                                                                      Skills  • Soft Skills:  Leadership, Problem-solving, Adaptability, Time Management, Teamwork, Written & Verbal Communication • Hard Skills: B2B Sales, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, CrunchBase, HubSpot, Research, Data Analysis, Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), Canva, Adobe Photoshop
